org.opendaylight.controller.appauth.authorization

Class Authorization<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.appauth.authorization.Authorization<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IResourceAuthorization
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Application, ContainerManager

    public abstract class Authorization<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IResourceAuthorization
    This abstract class implements the methods defined by IResourceAuthorization interface for each application class.

      java.util.Set<Resource> getAllResourcesforUser(java.lang.String userName)
      Returns the list of resources (resource + privilege) associated with the passed user name for this application context For each resource only the highest privilege occurrence is returned
      AppRoleLevel getApplicationRoleLevel(java.lang.String roleName)
      Returns the application role level for the specified role.
      java.util.List<ResourceGroup> getAuthorizedGroups(java.lang.String role)
      Returns the list of resource groups the given Role is authorized to use The returning object expresses the resource group name and the access its privilege for the given user role
      java.util.List<Resource> getAuthorizedResources(java.lang.String role)
      Returns the list of authorized resources for the given role For each resource only the highest privilege occurrence is returned
      java.lang.String getHighestUserRole(java.lang.String user)
      Returns the highest role the specified user has in this application context

      • isApplicationUser

        public boolean isApplicationUser(java.lang.String userName)
        Description copied from interface: IResourceAuthorization
        Return whether the specified user has access to this application. In other words if the user is associated any roles belonging to this application.
        Specified by:
        isApplicationUser in interface IResourceAuthorization
        Parameters:
        userName - the user name
        Returns:
        true if the user has access to this application's resources, false otherwise

      • getApplicationRoleLevel

        public AppRoleLevel getApplicationRoleLevel(java.lang.String roleName)
        Description copied from interface: IResourceAuthorization
        Returns the application role level for the specified role. If the role is not known to this application NOUSER will be returned as specified in AppRoleLevel
        Specified by:
        getApplicationRoleLevel in interface IResourceAuthorization
        Parameters:
        roleName - the role name to query
        Returns:
        the application level of the given role in the application context as specified by AppRoleLevel. If the role is not part of this application's roles, NOUSER is returned.
